column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Trees frozen in the ice . "
#Text=Unalaq says : " It 's just like the sacred forest Tonraq destroyed in the North . "
#Text=Korra says : " So , what do I do ? "
#Text=Unalaq says : " You must find your way to the heart of the forest where the dormant spirit portal lies .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah !
#Text=If she goes , we go , too !
#Text=" Unalaq says : " The Avatar must go alone .
#Text=" Korra says : " But I do n't have any connection with the spirits .
#Text=In fact , it seems like they hate me .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You have to believe in yourself , like I believe in you .
#Text=What is it ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I guess I 'm just so used to people telling me how to do things that I forgot what it was like to have someone trust in me .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Korra , all the past Avatars live on inside of you .
#Text=Let them guide you .
#Text=Let them help you find the light in the dark .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait here , I 'll be okay .
#Text=" Mako says : " Good luck .
#Text="
